On Memorial Day we pay tribute to those who have given their lives for our country. Thank you to all who have served our great nation and fought for our freedoms! http

Incredible start to #MemorialDay in Black Hawk County honoring those who have laid down their lives for our freedoms. We went to the Waterloo Memorial Day parade & then I had the opportunity to speak at the AMVETS Memorial Day service in Cedar Falls. http

As we celebrate #MemorialDay I encourage you to take a moment & reflect on the real reason for this holiday: the brave men & women who have laid down their lives for our freedoms. God Bless our troops our veterans & all who have given their lives in service to our country.üá∫üá∏
